lead_paragraph: Jim Harrick has returned to the coaching ranks, hired yesterday to run the Bakersfield Jam in the N.B.A. Development League. Harrick, 67, resumes his career three years after resigning at the University of Georgia and 10 years after being fired at U.C.L.A.
